AI.​CmdrAI.​CmdrAction.​Actions.​TakeOrJoinCmdrAction

Base class for Take and Join like CmdrAI actions.  Takes a source garrison id, from which a detachment can be formed to perform the action.  See implementations in TakeLocationCmdrAction and ReinforceCmdrAction.

Parent: CmdrAction

Functions
new

Create a TakeOrJoinCmdrAction. See derived classes for details.

Parameters
_srcGarrId

Number, <Model.GarrisonModel> id from which to send the detachment performing the action.
